reviews.review_msg: If you just need to pass this course, this is your prof. Otherwise, I definitely recommend taking someone else. He is a good person but his exams are really awful. Lectures are the reviews of book authors' slides, which cover mostly theoretical stuff. All practical problems (about 80% of his exams) should be learned individually.
Copies notes from another professor and doesnt know how to explain them. He just copies notes entire lecture...... please take his class to not learn anything

terrible lecturer. does not know anything about the course and he still continue to teach it. Tries to avoid a question he does not know how to answer by going off track and explaining something else. big blunder man.
Terrible terrible teacher. He does not have not a single clue what is he talking about. use jargon to fit in kinda guy

He is a nice and funny guy, gives good lectures. In fact I liked his lectures. However, he doesn't care too much about students' progress. Might be because he thinks the course is too easy, He didn't release a single practice for us in over a month. If you study regularly without assignments you'll be fine.
